documents.document: This might just be the weekend I finally mow the lawn (yay)
@torysaurus the great thing is Sevens is sat/sun now. I just got tired of walking thru the costumed masses on way home fri afternoon
So hoping this fine weekend (next weekend) is accurate. I have a forest of a lawn to mow! long range forcasts have a habit of changing :/
RIP Jaki Liebezeit. Your drumming with Can was something truly amazing https://t.co/I4AWyxJBM5
@torysaurus if enough people protest, a shrewd politician or politicians should emerge to carry that sentiment forward. That's how.
@redsezz worse than that summer 2000 or 2001. When it rained heavily for weeks (felt like the Ark was gonna arrive) at least that was warm.
@verslibre u heard this? The song, mixed with the real tape of a preacher talking about it's supposed backmasking https://t.co/JxlO2fvYTr
So next weekend is the 3-day weekend for me, and the weekend after too with Waitangi Day the following Monday. #winning #smartplanning
Well, long weekend (Wellington Anniversary) & sure enough the weather is shit. glad I'm working tomorrow-taken Auckland ann off in lieu :)
@JulieAnneGenter @nzherald absolutely. We have to focus on rail between Auckland-Hamilton-Tauranga. A golden triangle for people/freight.
So 10/10 for salesman integrity. Turns out the modem in question has had documented issues with this, and a firmware update addresses it.
@stevebiddle nope, I checked - it just wasn't on any of the low channels - I keep an eye on what channels are open & adjust as need be..
So I got home & updated the firmware, modem works fine now on both bands. The salesman did himself out of a sale, but saved me a bundle! 4/
.. he said try updating the firmware on the modem.. sometimes they have bug fixes..it hadn't occurred to me (hindsight, huh?).. 3/
..and I was explaining it to the salesperson, saying half my devices didn't connect anymore as they only used 2.4GHz.. he then said.. 2/
So... my modem stopped working on 2.4GHz band (still worked on 5GHz band). Was looking at Noel Leeming for a new one... 1/
@JamieWall2 time for Canada to step up and engineer some regime change in USA. PM Trudeau could be the wolf in sheeps clothing we need. ;)
@torysaurus just "being there" for a start. See *if* they wanna do somethings (movie, brunch, whatever) to get out & reduce sad alone-time?
Good luck, America. You're gonna need it. #NewDarkAge #Blackout
Taking the commuter train home with a phone at zero charge sucks. People/scenery watching is a bit boring.
@torysaurus have you watched "It's always sunny in Philadelphia"? That's some off-the-wall no boundaries humour there..
I keep reminding myself that everything probably won't end when Trump is sworn..but it's still fecking scary, and depressing a bit.
Dinner tonight was baked beans and potato bake (beans *In* that cheesy bake), served with rice. Lotta carbs, but SOOOO GOOD.
I wanna mow lawns this weekend, but Sunday weather looks like crap. Saturday is full. #DamnIt
@AndrewVossy I wish there was Thurs night NRL this week. Hey, any word on when Fox's League channel starts & whether Sky NZ will carry it??
Ok, so it's summer again?!?
Just watching Obama's last press conference. Man he's a class act. Can we have him as Prime Minister??
@verslibre yeah.. windy here in Taita, but nothing scary mad yet. Mind you we could be desensitised to that, yknow? Welly region peeps & all
Hmm... yeah, windy in Taita, but not the bastard mega-level yet. Hmmmm...
Busses so slooooow this afternoon. I just wanna get to the station for my train home.
@JamieWall2 pretty long bow comparing Mad Butcher with Jones. MB was badly misjudged humour, while Jones has a history of spitefulness
Would be cool ifthe storm waits till after 6pm. Give ppl a chance to get home safe first.
So.. when exactly is this weather bomb shit supposed to go down? #NothingYet
@gthurstonnz how'd you get yr hands on that? #wickedsetlist
Kinda excited about the coming weather bomb. Hell.. if summer is gonna be shit, at least be wild and stormy.
A bit of Eastenders, and a chance to put my feet up.. bliss. :)
@JamieWall2 yeah why not. As much as I hate his personal views, 'Nuge rocks out with the best of 'em. It's a bit like Gary Glitter in a way.
Clouds are so grim in the Hutt Valley. It will be soon. :(
@JamieWall2 I heard that a Springsteen tribute band pulled out though.. so not that good on the tribute band part. Is Scott Baio singing?
Summer was good this year. Both days were quite enjoyable.
@verslibre I go to work everyday with a backpack. I feel weird without it on weekends.
The more I think about the idea, the more I like it. Obama should resign 24 hours before Trump gets sworn in so Biden gets a day as Pres!
@torysaurus they say anything between 8am and 2pm gets burned off anyway, so probably ok. Late nite snack is the real nono. Apparently.
@redsezz good to hear. Sounds like ur on top of it.
@redsezz still pretty confident about tying up the loose ends?
@verslibre Eh? Because our house is ok, my work office is still open.. but there's still so much underlying suspicion about things..
@redsezz that's surprising, I thought house would be tougher to nail down in this scenario. No pun intended.
@redsezz yeah, in our case we had to get the builders 2c that little cracks in bricks weren't weakening it & not caused by quake. Stressful.
So the car park AND the movie theatre are gonna be demolished in Queensgate..? And the rest of it is safe, and gonna be kept? Riiiiight...
@redsezz we bought ours just a wee while after the Seddon quakes in 2013. Totally get where you're coming from. Insurance is a pain to setup
@JamieWall2 I've always had disdain for french rugby, due to how they collaborated with nazi puppet govt to cripple french league in '40s
@torysaurus Muslim band? Weeell there was a hard core punk band in the 80s called Fearless Iranians From Hell. It was all an act though..
@verslibre On balance, Ringo is probably the sanest, most down to earth Beatle, George was probably the coolest.
So.. are we all looking for a modern day Valerie Solanas now??
At this time, we need to focus on what we can do here in New Zealand. We need to STOP people from voting for Winston Petersnext year
If 2016 was a person, it's got drunk, taken loads of drugs, fallen over, defecated in it's pants, vomited on itself & is now convulsing..
Welly folk.. remember how I said the nights were getting warmer yesterday?? Yeeaaaah, well maybe I kinda jinxed that.
@JulieAnneGenter @andrewflowers @Redistrict yikes! That really shows they're clinging to a fading demographic.
@torysaurus has he pulled up a Donald Trump comparison?
After an early flurry just after sunset, pretty quiet night for fireworks in my neighbourhood last night. Excellent. :)
Oh and is it just me, or are nights getting warmer...?
So.. 2 days at work, then USA election day off, then 2 days, then weekend. Easy. Helps that I have 2 weeks off at Christmas coming too..
@JamieWall2 could this be the birth of a new closely-contested rivalry? I hope so. Rugby needs new rivalries.
@scarfacelaws good point. So little out there about negative/degrading male stereotypes. There are men out there that can cook.
This game is making the internet explode #WorldSeries
@verslibre that beats my ricies/banana/milk brekkie. Bit jealous. Still, brekkie is good. Dunno how I skipped it for years a while ago..
Ricies, banana & milk. Simple but filling. Now I can take-on anything! (I think...)
After a desk move and various techncal issues from the move (now fixed). Today is gonna be a good work day.
@torysaurus bummer. A lot of the wife's family moved to Brisbane in the '00s. Woulda been handy (just in case)
@torysaurus wonder if that's for flying to aus as well as domestic...? Did they say?
It's great the sun is bright in the morning now but it does make my eyes water a bit. Easily mistaken for crying. Anyone else get that?
...and on election day you get to see politicians being a bit nervous, a rarity.
Still only 1 week till a day off to watch the US election. Yeah I'm an election junkie. Live tv is always fun...
Only Wednesday? ONLY WEDNESDAY??? BAH
@JamieWall2 how dare you forget how annoying Mehts (and indeed that whole damn Cantab team) were... #neverforget
@MMFlint looking forward to seeing it here in New Zealand in a few days time when it screens here..
..he needed to THINK about his actions, and consider her safety. He didn't. I honestly was expecting guilty of manslaughter
.. who is hysterical & drunk, you have to consider THEIR safety as well as yours. If she was attacking him (self defense or unprovoked)...
Re: Tostee. Don't agree with the verdict, but the can see their reasoning. In the heat of the moment, if you r dealing with someone..
@torysaurus now if only they could make the startup sound a meow, and purrs whenever it's locked...
@verslibre you win the weird workmates award?
Weekend! Where are you...?
@torysaurus though I think in some jurisdictions, isn't taking an act where you don't care if it leads to death can be construed as murder?
@torysaurus his stupid actions led to her death. The only question is whether he INTENDED her to die.. that's why i think manslaughter
I'm picking a manslaughter verdict..
Dammit Tostee jury. MAKE UP YOUR MIND!!
@torysaurus embarrassment is worse if your birthday is close to xmas. Mine's dec 19, and I'm so comfortable with it being overshadowed. .
Urgh, I just heard Ann Coulter on radio for a few seconds. No fun.
@TheDailyBlogNZ @CitizenBomber just a thought. Any chance u could track down National election ads from 2007 & review them retrospectively?
Made a big playlist of great psychedelic pop from the last 10 years. A joy to listen to on shuffle. Indie music is in a sweet spot at the mo
Things like that bring OCD out.. I just wanna go over the fence and sort their washing line out did I mention the clothes on the ground?
Really don't know if the neighbours are thick or just don't care about getting the washing dry on the line..
My neighbors keep leaving washing out on the line in the rain, worse still it's all bunched up so it would never dry in fine weather..
Beautiful spring day in Wellington. And it's a Monday :(
Oh God. MONDAY. Didn't I do this before??
Now we have a huge empty cupboard where the hot water cylinder was. Need to figure out what we wanna do with it. A nice problem to have.
Yesterday I had a shower. Today I had a **SHOWER**!! The difference in water pressure from the gas heating is awesome. Really blasts out
First big upgrade inside our house yesterday - we got the gas connected, and a new gas hot water system. No more hot water cylinde.
@verslibre because he's full of American cheese?? (You r what u eat etc...)
I'm gonna get home before it rains.. I'm gonna get home before it rains... :)
